text: Hethum II (Armenian: Հեթում Բ; 1266 – November 17, 1307), was king of the Armenian Kingdom of Cilicia, ruling from 1289 to 1293, 1295 to 1296 and 1299 to 1303, while Armenia was a subject state of the Mongol Empire. He was the son of Leo III of Armenia. Category:Monarchs of Armenia Category:13th-century Armenian people
title: Hethum II of Armenia
